title: An Act to stop profiling transgender people and low-income women

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Montaño of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1893) of Samantha Montaño relative to transgender people and low-income women and the penalties for certain offenses.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
